title: How To Win A Gay Marriage Case: Create A Plaintiff Dream Team
teaser: We take a look at the strategy behind a lawsuit to reverse the Florida state constitution's ban on same-sex marriage.
contentencoded:
Florida is one of 33 states that currently bans same-sex marriage. And as LGBT rights advocates collect victories in other states, there is no shortage of lawsuits in the state of Florida hoping to build on that momentum.

But what does it take to win — especially in the court of public opinion? Maybe, just the right kind of plaintiffs. From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Arianna Prothero of WLRN reports on the strategy behind Equality Florida’s lawsuit.
